name: Beaver trail
description:
Overcome  3D platforming challenges,  meet the other hikers and make friends but most importantly... enjoy the hike down beaver trail.

Made by Leon Stansfield.

Special thanks to Kenny's assets, Dialogic and the Godot game engine.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Crouch: CTRL

Sprint: Shift

Change camera view: C

Pause: Escape
